name: Schütze Mike 2 VS Zombie
overview: Backbone Demo from Reentier with sections composed in AMOS and released as freeware in 2018. It is like it's predecessor, a platformer but now there are the dead and the undead to deal with! There are 3 worlds to explore with 9 different stages, Playing time approximately 1 to 4 hours. Mike has the choice between 4 different weapons. There are over 10 different zombies.
